csci331.team.red.server

Class ServerEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • csci331.team.red.server.ServerEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ServerEngine
extends java.lang.Thread
    Main game logic class. Manages flow of information between the two clients, and manages loading random game assets, as well as keeping client's in sync. Implements Thread and is runnable via Thread.start()
    Author:
    ojourmel

      • onPlayerConnect

        public void onPlayerConnect()
        Callback for when a player connects. If two players connect, then the main game logic is started.

      • onPlayerDisconnect

        public void onPlayerDisconnect()
        Callback for when a player has disconnected. Shut down the other clients, and stop this ServerEngine
        TODO: Consider implementing a reconnect period, where a player could resume their game

      • onPlayerQuit

        public void onPlayerQuit()
        Callback for when a player has quit. Shut down the other clients, and stop this ServerEngine
